com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Interface RecoverDatabaseOperations

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecoverDatabaseOperationsImpl

    public interface RecoverDatabaseOperations
    Contains the operation to create recovery requests for Azure SQL Databases.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateResponse create(java.lang.String sourceServerName, RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateParameters parameters)
      Issues a recovery request for an Azure SQL Database.
      java.util.concurrent.Future<RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateResponse> createAsync(java.lang.String sourceServerName, RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateParameters parameters)
      Issues a recovery request for an Azure SQL Database.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateResponse create(java.lang.String sourceServerName,
                                              RecoverDatabaseOperationCreateParameters parameters)
                                       throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                              org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                              javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                              java.io.IOException,
                                              ServiceException
        Issues a recovery request for an Azure SQL Database.
        Parameters:
        sourceServerName - Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server on which the database was hosted.
        parameters - Required. Additional parameters for the Create Recover Database Operation request.
        Returns:
        Contains the response to the Create Recover Database Operation request.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - Thrown if there was an error configuring the parser for the response body.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - Thrown if there was an error parsing the response body.
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if there was an error creating the DOM transformer.
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
        ServiceException - Thrown if an unexpected response is found.
